body_html: I've went through that already and confirmed I have a working tensorflow + GPU package. The issue is that the python module is named tensorflow and not tensorflow-gpu. How do you make it install as tensorflow-gpu instead of tensorflow?

body: I've went through that already and confirmed I have a working tensorflow + GPU package. The issue is that the python module is named `tensorflow` and not `tensorflow-gpu`. How do you make it install as `tensorflow-gpu` instead of `tensorflow`?
